name: SANRI New Demo
description: SANRI is coming to Steam on January 9, 2023! If you haven't played the demo yet, you can try the updated demo now. Don't forget to add it to your wishlist to be notified when the game is released! Add to Wishlist! SANRI is a first-person psychological horror game where you play a schizophrenic character whose wife goes missing during the camp. Face the delusions, solve the mystery and try to find it despite your constantly distorted perception of time-space.   STORYLINE   What would you do if you woke up after a nice night camping with your partner and couldn't see them next to you? Grab your flashlight and dive deep into the forest to find it. Your schizophrenic delusions will never leave you. Despite all this, will you be able to find him?
